Seolgiok.metaDescription: Introducing Seolgiok, a clear and deep bowl brewed with 24 hours of waiting.
Seolgiok.heroTagline: Clear and deep taste brewed with sincerity
Seolgiok.featuresMainDescLine1: We boil it with sincerity every morning using top-quality Hanwoo beef and fresh ingredients.
Seolgiok.featuresMainDescLine2: The secret to the deep and rich broth is time and sincerity.
Seolgiok.featuresMainDescLine3: We serve a healthy and hearty meal.
Seolgiok.feature1Desc: We deliver a taste you can trust by using only top-quality Hanwoo beef and domestic ingredients.
Seolgiok.feature2Desc: Using the traditional Toryeom method, the deep taste of the broth permeates every grain of rice.
Seolgiok.feature3Desc: You can trust us even more with our open kitchen system that transparently reveals the cooking process.
Seolgiok.firstTimeCard1Desc: Experience the harmonious taste of clear Gomtang and Suyuk (boiled beef slices).
Seolgiok.firstTimeCard2Desc: We pack it with care so you can enjoy the taste of the restaurant at home.
Seolgiok.case1Desc: Enjoy a special meal with family and colleagues in a spacious and pleasant space.
Seolgiok.case2Desc: Convenient parking space is provided so you can visit by car without inconvenience.
Seolgiok.faqA1: Every morning, fresh Hanwoo beef bone and briskets are boiled in a cauldron for 24 hours to create a deep and clear taste.
Seolgiok.faqA2: Yes, all menus are available for takeout. For uncooked takeout, we provide plenty of broth.
Seolgiok.faqA3: Yes, group seats are available. Please make a reservation by phone for your convenience.
Seolgiok.faqA4: You can use the parking lot within the building, and we provide a 2-hour free parking ticket when dining.
Seolgiok.faqA5: Yes, we operate a break time from 3 PM to 5 PM to prepare better food.
Seolgiok.faqA6: There is a separate Gomtang menu for children, so kids can enjoy it without burden.
